Human Resource / Admin Manager Job at Interswstik Nigeria Limited




        
    

        
        Interswstik Nigeria Limited (ISNL) is a company engaged in the manufacturing and supply of plastic products. We specialize in producing high-quality plastic materials for various industrial and consumer applications, ensuring durability, functionality, and sustainability. Our operations are built around precision manufacturing, innovation, and meeting the diverse needs of clients across multiple sectors.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resource / Admin Manager

Job Location: Ikenne, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilties
Recruitment & Staffing:
     

            
    




	Develop and implement recruitment strategies.
	Manage end-to-end recruitment processes (advertising, shortlisting, interviewing, and onboarding).


Employee Relations:


	Foster a positive work environment and manage employee grievances.
	Promote effective communication between management and staff.


Performance Management:


	Design and oversee performance appraisal systems.
	Work with line managers to set KPIs and support employee development.


Training & Development:


	Identify training needs and organize learning programs.
	Support employee career growth and succession planning.


Compensation & Benefits:


	Administer payroll, salary reviews, and employee benefits.
	Ensure competitive and fair compensation structures.


HR Policies & Compliance:


	Develop and update HR policies in line with labor laws and organizational goals.
	Ensure compliance with statutory regulations.


Workforce Planning:


	Analyze and forecast staffing needs.
	Plan strategies to attract and retain top talent.


Health, Safety & Welfare:


	Ensure a safe and conducive working environment.
	Implement employee wellness programs.


HR Administration:


	Maintain accurate employee records.
	Prepare HR reports for management decision-making.


Qualifications


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 4 - 5 years of experience.


Salary
N200,000 - N220,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: h.r@d2h.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
